title: Curriculum Development Practical Competency Enhancement: Mobile Language Learning Using Interactive Multimedia Materials

context.additional_context: Competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can accurately utilize 80% of real-life conversational expressions in the target language through interactive multimedia materials
Learners perform voluntary reviews three or more times per week using quiz/game elements provided in mobile environments
Learners complete language tasks 100% using collaboration tools with peers (real-time chat/audio recording sharing)
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
